## hexesEqual() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Determine if two hex coordinates are equivalent.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hexesEqual(a?: HexCoordinate, b?: HexCoordinate): boolean;
```

_(Optional)_ The second hex coordinate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the coordinates are the same, false otherwise.
